channel.title: Making myself admin on Bren's server [HELP]
channel.description: Well, i've just recently got "Horror-Moss" server, but i can't seem to make myself admin, could anyone help please?

item.title: Making myself admin on Bren's server [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Go into you’re source file. Be it Testscape, Pimpscape, whatever. Then go into the Character file, double-click the person you wan’t to make an administrator/moderator and change the player rights to one of the following :

1 = Moderator
2 = Administrator
3 = Owner

And someone already tried to help you… See how much quicker you’re answerd if you post in the correct section?

Read full topic
item.source: Making myself admin on Bren's server [HELP]

item.title: Making myself admin on Bren's server [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Called_enzo Called enzo
item.description:
@Called_enzo wrote:

go to char file…

clikc ur name

open it

go to player rights

change to 3

save+compile+ run

there u go
